solution_line_template: In a day, Megan earns {hours_per_day} x ${hourly_wage} = $<<{hours_per_day}*{hourly_wage}={daily_earnings}>>{daily_earnings}.
In a month, she will be earning {work_days_per_month} x ${daily_earnings} = $<<{work_days_per_month}*{daily_earnings}={monthly_earnings}>>{monthly_earnings}.
Therefore, Megan will earn a total of {number_of_months} x ${monthly_earnings} = $<<{number_of_months}*{monthly_earnings}={total_earnings}>>{total_earnings} for two months of work.
